definition: Kangxi radical 61 (心) as a vertical side element
to empathize with/to show solicitude for/T-shirt (loanword)
not to worry/not to show concern
not to worry about the gossip (idiom); to do the right thing regardless of what others say
to give sympathy to the rich and relief to the poor (idiom)
to give sympathy to the rich and relief to the poor (idiom)
to die without regrets (idiom); to sacrifice oneself without hesitation
to emphasize down to last detail (idiom); to show every possible consideration/meticulous care

sentences.english: That they buy T-shirts for and spout off about endlessly?
sentences.chinese: 無非就是買了件t恤什麼的至於說個沒完嘛。

sentences.english: She often wears a red T-shirt and black trousers.
sentences.chinese: 她經常穿一件紅色的t恤和黑色的褲子。

sentences.english: The printed Cola on this T-shirt reminded me about a song of Jay Chou.
sentences.chinese: 恤上印着可樂的圖，令我想起了周董的“迷迭香”。

sentences.english: White round neck long sleeve T-shirt with pink 'Broken Heart' graphic.
sentences.chinese: 圓領與桃紅色心形圖案設計的長袖恤杉。

sentences.english: you have the like, little tiny Princeton T-shirts.
sentences.chinese: 你一定有小普林斯頓t恤一類的東西。

sentences.english: Tao T-shirt designed a boy participant.
sentences.chinese: 一個t恤設計一個男孩道參與者。

sentences.english: You can buy these T-shirts online.
sentences.chinese: 你可以買到這些t恤在線。

sentences.english: He wears a white T-shirt and blue jeans.
sentences.chinese: 他穿戴一件白色t恤和牛仔褲。

definition: not to worry/not to show concern
to give in to/to be swayed by (personal considerations etc)/Taiwan pr. [xun2]/to follow/to expose publicly/variant of 侚[xun4]/variant of 殉[xun4]
